title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-6.15 - Toilet facility maintenance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-6.15 - Toilet facility maintenance

State Regulations

Toilet facilities, including toilet fixtures and any
related vestibules, shall be kept clean and in good repair. A supply of toilet
tissue shall be provided at each toilet at all times. Easily cleanable
receptacles shall be provided for waste materials. Toilet rooms used by women
shall have at least one covered waste receptacle. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-6.15

Repealed

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
